info.name: Student Management
info.description: Comprehensive collection for managing students, their contact information, devices, and self-service operations in the Learning Management System (LMS). These endpoints handle student profile management, contact information, device tracking, and enrollment management with proper multi-tenant isolation and role-based access controls.
